title: A letter from a nobleman in London, to his friend in the country written some months ago. Now published for the common good.
author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.
notes: By George Savile, Marquis of Halifax.
Dated at end: "Dat. 8. of Feb. 1689."; imprint conjectured by Wing, which estimates 1689/1690 as publication date.
Reproduction of the original in the Lincoln's Inn Library, London.
